text: Street Corner Symphony is the second album by Carrie Lucas. Released in 1978 on the SOLAR Records label. ==Track listing== #"Street Corner Symphony" 6:12 #"But My Heart Says No" 4:02 #"Tic Toc" 4:17 #"The Depths of My Soul" 3:38 #"The Edge of Night" 6:13 #"Questions" 5:19 #"Simpler Days" 3:42 #"Reflections" 1:17 #"Street Corner Symphony (12 Version)" 6:12 #"Tic Toc (12 Version)" 5:03 ==References== Category:1978 albums Category:SOLAR Records albums Category:Carrie Lucas albums
title: Street Corner Symphony (album)
